name: Darkness in the clouds
description:
Game created for the Ludum Dare Game Jam #48. The Theme was "Deeper and deeper".  Everything except the Music was created by me.

Explore the dark side of the Cloudworld by following the guidance of your Ancestors.
Can you stay strong?

Controles:
 WASD or Arrow Keys

Music:
- SONRIE by Charles Michel 1994
- The end of the world by Dicotomica
